content: **i wanted to make this as easy as possible to knit and after a little trial and error i figured out a great trick ** once you have the trick it s much easier than it looks - you only use one colour per row and you only knit or slip stitches **no purling at all** the original was both knitted in cullercoats and is very bulky perfect for a seafarer but you can make it as heavy or fine as you like it s best if there is good contrast between the two yarns no shared colours for the smallest size you ll need roughly 100m of each yarn **this pattern has also been used to make a big floor cushion and baskets - link to baskets instructions 1 ** **many thanks to the testers ** hetty1109 wireknitter malin snowflakequeen bfcallsmemartha colleyflower wellwoman mireille7 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/stitchnerds/2896406/1-25#2
